title: PM, Sardar Attique discuss matters of next elections in AJK
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 16 (APP): President of Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK) Muslim Conference Sardar Attique Ahmed Khan called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Wednesday and discussed matters relating to the next elections in AJK.
Minister for Kashmir and Gilgit Baltistan Affairs Ali Ameen Gandapur, Chief Organizer Saifullah Niazi and Secretary General Pakistan Tehrik-e-Insaf (PTI) Amir Kayani were also present in the meeting.
The meeting decided that both PTI and Muslim Conference will participate in the AJK elections according to their respective manifestos.
However, with the complete unanimity of views on the issue of Kashmir, the two parties will continue their joint efforts to highlight the issue of Kashmir.
